info.title: BaaS Pix QR Code
info.description:
BaaS Pix QR Code

Concepts:

Idempotence-Key

To ensure that communication failures/interruptions do not result in accidental data loss or duplication, such as making a duplicate payment, the APIs are designed so that each request is executed “exactly once”. For this, the concept of Idempotence was implemented.

The Client System must generate a new key for each request, guaranteeing that each operation will be executed only once. In case you do not receive a response to a request, it can be sent again with the same key to obtain the response. If a new key is generated, we will understand that it is a new operation and will be executed a second time.

The idempotence key must be in GUID (v4) format, i.e. 32 hexadecimal digits, in an 8-4-4-4-12 array.
Example: '69F963C6-7487-4363-9406-A1DE2A9636D4'
The Key-Idempotencia will be stored in the API cache for a period of 24 hours.

parameters.name: Idempotence-Key
parameters.description: Switch to, in case of failures/interruptions in communication not result in accidental data loss or duplication.

schema.description: Params to decode a QR Code

oneOf.description: Dynamic QR Code with due date

final_value.description: Value after deduction, discount, interest and fine

ispb_pss.description: ISPB from PSS. When provided it means the QR code is for "Pix Saque".

schema.description: Params to create a new static QR Code

format.description:
Sets request return format:
* IMAGE: Static QR Code image
* PAYLOAD_BASE_64: Static QR Code payload
* IMAGE_AND_PAYLOAD_BASE_64: Static QR Code image and payload

ispb_pss.description: ISPB from PSS. When provided it means the QR code is for "Pix Saque".
